description: Simple, quick and kid friendly baking!
name: 100 Cookies - Condensed Milk Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line several baking trays with baking paper or a silicone mat. In an electric mixer cream sugar, butter and condensed milk. Add flour, slowly mix to combine.
Divide mixture into desired portions for different flavour variations.

Add desired flavourings to each portionSuggestions - * Milo * peanut butter* chocolate chips* sultanas, currants or raisins * mini marshmallows* Smarties, M&Ms etc* sprinkles (stir some through but then also roll the dough balls in extra sprinkles)* white chocolate* crushed Cornflakes* peanuts
Roll rounded tbs of mixture into balls, flatten slightly.
Bake in oven for 8-10 minutes or until golden. Rest on the pan for 5 minutes, turn onto a wire rack to cool completely.
